tools.name: docs
tools.description: Gets the documentation for an internal package or function. This should be the first place to look for how something works.

package.title: Package Path
package.description: Package of the function or struct to get documents for.

function.title: Function Name
function.description: Function to get information about.  Can be a package level function SomeFunction or a struct SomeStruct, or a struct function SomeStruct.StructFunction. Leave empty to get package level docs.

tools.name: format
tools.description:
Formats the code according to the specified style guide.

This command runs 'make fmt' to format all code in the project according to the configured style guide.

package.title: Package Path
package.description: Specific package or file to format (e.g., dir1 | dir2/... | file.go). Leave empty to format all packages.

tools.name: lint
tools.description: Runs the linter on the code

package.title: Package Path
package.description: Specific package or file to lint (e.g., dir1 | dir2/... | file.go). Leave empty to lint all packages.

tools.name: run_tests
tools.description:
Run the test suite for the project.

Args:
    package: Optional package path to test (default: all packages)

Returns:
    Test results and coverage information

package.title: Package Path
package.description: Specific package to test (e.g., ./cmd/server). Leave empty to test all packages.

test.title: Test Name
test.description: Specific test to run (e.g., TestAddition). Leave empty to run all tests.

tools.name: rebuild_unit_test_db
tools.description:
Initializes Or Rebuilds the unit test database.  Use when starting a new project or if there is a schema mismatch in the unit tests.

This command drops and recreates the unit test database to ensure it matches the current schema.

tools.name: make_object
tools.description: Code generates a new internal only model / controller / and migration

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: Name of the model to create in snake case.

model_plural.title: Model Plural
model_plural.description: Name of the model in plural form using snake case.

tools.name: make_public_object
tools.description: Code generates a new public facing model / controller / and migration

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: Name of the model to create in snake case.

model_plural.title: Model Plural
model_plural.description: Name of the model in plural form using snake case.
